titleStmt.title: A schort and general confessioun of the trevv Christian faith according to Goddis Word, and actis of our Parliamentis subscryuit be the Kingis Maiestie, his houshald, his nobilitie and haill estaitis of this realme, to the glorie of God, and gude exampill of all men, at Edinburgh the 20. day of Ianuarie, 1580, and 14. Zeir of his reigne.
Scottish Confession of Faith (1581)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the National Library of Scotland.
